tool_description: Creates customizable configuration settings for review widgets based on business requirements and platform constraints.

widget_type.description: Type of review widget: summary_widget, detailed_list, carousel, grid, or inline

max_reviews_displayed.description: Maximum number of reviews to display (1-50)

enable_filtering.description: Enable filtering options by rating or date

auto_refresh_minutes.description: Auto-refresh interval in minutes (0 for disabled, 1-1440)

color_scheme.description: Color scheme: light, dark, or custom

error_messages: Invalid widget type: Use one of [summary_widget, detailed_list, carousel, grid, inline].
Invalid max_reviews_displayed: Must be between 1 and 50.
Invalid auto_refresh_minutes: Must be between 0 and 1440 (24 hours).
Invalid color_scheme: Use light, dark, or custom.
usage: Specify the widget_type and customize display options using the boolean and numeric parameters. The tool generates a complete configuration object.

widget_settings.description: JSON string containing all widget configuration parameters

estimated_load_time.description: Estimated widget load time in milliseconds
